<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Try to create a COFFVCRuntimeBootstrapper instance. An optional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// RuntimePath can be given to specify the location of directory that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// contains all vc runtime library files such as ucrt.lib and msvcrt.lib. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// no path was given, it will try to search the MSVC toolchain and Windows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// SDK installation and use the found library files automatically.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note that depending on the build setting, a different library</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// file must be used. In general, if vc runtime was statically linked to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// object file that is to be jit-linked, LoadStaticVCRuntime and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// InitializeStaticVCRuntime must be used with libcmt.lib, libucrt.lib,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// libvcruntimelib. If vc runtime was dynamically linked LoadDynamicVCRuntime</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// must be used along with msvcrt.lib, ucrt.lib, vcruntime.lib.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// More information is on:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cpp/c-runtime-library/crt-library-features</span></CodeLine>
